Function Documentation

std::auto_ptr< BitBuffer> convertToBitBuffer (  DataBuffer &  buffer  ) 
 

Converts a DataBuffer to a BitBuffer If mem mapped the buffer is copied and inparamter is unchagned.

If not mem mapped the buffer is moved and the returned buffer owns the buffer.

Parameters:
buffer In buffer
Returns:
A BitBuffer
